public class MessageHandler extends Object implements Observer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handle(AcceptPlayer message)
    handle AcceptPlayer messages and notify the player's view if him or another player have been accepted.
    void
    handle(AllPlayer message)
    handle AllPlayers message, notify the player his opponents
    void
    handle(AnotherPlayerDisconnect message)
    handle AnotherPlayerDisconnected messages, update virtualModel.players and notify the player's view the leaving player's object.
    void
    handle(AskNewNickname message)
    handle AskNewNickname messages and notify the player's view that the nickname chosen it's unavailable.
    void
    handle(AskNumbPlayer message)
    handle AskNumbPlayer messages and notify the first player's view that server requested for the number of players.
    void
    handle(Assigned_CC message)
    handle Assigned_CC messages, update the message.nickname's player.commonScore in the virtualModel and notify the player's view of the completed CommonGoalCard with the associated score.
    void
    handle(ChairAssigned message)
    handle ChairAssigned messages, update virtualModel.chair and notify the player's view of which player detains the chair.
    void
    handle(Connected_Before_FirstPlayer message)
    A handle method for the message when a player tries to connect before the first player
    void
    handle(Disconnection_Answer message)
    handle Disconnection_Answer messages, update the player's list and notify the player's view that server accepted its disconnection request.
    void
    handle(Final_point message)
    handle Final_Point messages and notify the player's view with the final scoreboard received from server.
    void
    handle(First_finish message)
    handle First_finish messages, update the virtualModel.firstFinish value and notify the player's view of the first finishing player.
    void
    handle(Message message)
    hande Message messages and notify the player's view of their payload.
    void
    handle(NotTakeCardBoard message)
    handle NotTakeCardBoard messages and notify player's view that the cards chosen aren't adjacent.
    void
    handle(Numb_Player_Answer message)
    handle Numb_Player_Answer messages, update virtualModel.playerNumber and notify the player's view of the player number chosen by the first player.
    void
    handle(PlayerReturned message)
    handle PlayerReturned messages, update virtualModel.players and notify the player's view the returning player's object.
    void
    handle(Receiving_Mex message)
    A handle method for a message recieved
    void
    handle(Send_EffectiveCard message)
    A handle method to send the effective common goal cards
    void
    handle(Send_PersonalCard message)
    handle PersonalCard, notify the player's view his personal card
    void
    handle(ShowColumn message)
    handle ShowColumn messages and notify the player's view of the columns that he could use, with his library to.
    void
    handle(Turn message)
    handle Turn messages, update virtualModel.isMyTurn attribute, and notify the player's view if it's his turn, if his turn is ended or the new current player.
    void
    handle(UpdateBoard message)
    handle UpdateBoard messages, update the virtualModel.board value and notify the player's view of the new board using a Board obj.
    void
    handle(Updatelibrary message)
    handle UpdateLibrary message, update the player library in the virtualModel and notify the player of the change
    void
    handle(WaitList message)
    handle WaitList messages and notify the player's view that the game he wants to join is already full.
    void
    update(Message message)
    An update method for the visitor patern that forwards the message to the message class
